search.name: CodeProject (CP)
search.description:
Search CodeProject for source code, samples and tutorials
Switches:
/a - Search for authors.
/t - Search in titles.
/d - Search in descriptions.
/k - Search for keywords.
Example:
cp Saurwein /a
